thread.title: This Pepsi commercial is the best way to look back at Jeff Gordon's career in 60 seconds
thread.title_full: This Pepsi commercial is the best way to look back at Jeff Gordon's career in 60 seconds

author: Nina Mandell
title: This Pepsi commercial is the best way to look back at Jeff Gordon's career in 60 seconds
text:
This Pepsi commercial is the best way to look back at Jeff Gordon's career in 60 seconds USA Today Sports 1 day ago Nina Mandell Jeff Gordon is retiring from NASCAR at the end of this season, ending a career that brought four championships and 92 career wins in NASCAR’s Sprint Cup Series. To honor him, his long-running sponsor Pepsi released this farewell which shows him as a young driver to the veteran that he is now.
AdChoices Gordon spoke to USA TODAY Sports’ Jeff Gluck about his long-running relationship with Pepsi, who has been his sponsor since 1997 and what he learned about being able to say no.
“(Sponsors) come to you with a lot of ideas. You don’t have to say yes to every single idea that comes your way. Sometimes you have to draw the line, and other times you have to push yourself outside your comfort zone. There’s been plenty of things along the way where I’m going, ‘I can’t believe I’m doing this.’ But you put your faith in them. … I’m certainly glad we didn’t turn down Test Drive. Everywhere I go still today, people who have no idea what NASCAR racing is are like, ‘Man, I love that video.’ ”
Read more at USATODAY.com/NASCAR.
